page.goBack.description: Puppeteer - navigates to the previous page in the history

page.goForward.description: Puppeteer - navigates to the next page in the history

page.goto.description: Puppeteer - navigates the page to a URL

page.hover.description: Puppeteer - hovers over the center of an element within the page

page.pdf.description: Puppeteer - generates a PDF from the page

page.screenshot.description: Puppeteer - generates a screenshot of the page

page.waitFor.description: Puppeteer - waits until an element/predicate/timeout within the page is resolved

page.waitForFunction.description: Puppeteer - waits until a predicate within the page returns a truthy value

page.waitForNavigation.description: Puppeteer - waits until the page navigates to a new URL or reloads

page.waitForRequest.description: Puppeteer - waits until a request by URL/predicate is resolved

page.waitForResponse.description: Puppeteer - waits until a response by URL/predicate is resolved

page.waitForSelector.description: Puppeteer - waits until an element (by selector) is appeared in the page

page.waitForXPath.description: Puppeteer - waits until an element (by XPath) is appeared in the page
